GSD.description:
Bluetooth: L2CAP: Fix user-after-free

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit 0c108cf3ad386e0084277093b55a351c49e0be27. For more details please see the references link.
